snippet.title: Goblin Stone - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the trailer for this upcoming turn-based RPG, where players will explore a world comprised of procedurally generated hand-drawn 2D levels, create a goblin lair that allows them to manage and improve their roster, to mapping your lineage as well as draft the perfect raiding team, and more. 

Goblin Stone comes from Vince McDonnell, the creator of the iOS game Zombie Farm, with a fully narrated story voiced by actor James Smillie, and music composed by Peter McConnell of Hearthstone, Broken Age, and Monkey Island.

Take on humans, elves, and dwarves when Goblin Stone launches in early 2022 for PC.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #GoblinStone
